description: This is a source code file for a FastAPI backend API for a simple todo application. It defines API endpoints for health checks, configuration retrieval, and CRUD operations for todo items, including route handlers, API documentation details, and middleware setup.

classes.name: HealthResponse
classes.description: A Pydantic model used to structure the health check response message.

methods.name: health_check()
methods.description: Endpoint to verify that the service is running.

methods.name: get_config()
methods.description: Returns current runtime configuration details such as database path.

methods.name: api_list_todos()
methods.description: Retrieves all todo items from the database.

methods.name: api_create_todo(payload: TodoCreate)
methods.description: Creates a new todo item with provided data.

methods.name: api_get_todo( todo_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the todo item"), )
methods.description: Fetches a specific todo item by its ID.

methods.name: api_update_todo( todo_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the todo item"), payload: TodoUpdate = ..., )
methods.description: Partially updates an existing todo item based on provided fields.

methods.name: api_delete_todo( todo_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the todo item"), )
methods.description: Deletes a todo item specified by its ID.

ctags.name: api_delete_todo
ctags.signature: ( todo_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the todo item"), )

ctags.name: api_get_todo
ctags.signature: ( todo_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the todo item"), )

ctags.name: api_update_todo
ctags.signature: ( todo_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the todo item"), payload: TodoUpdate = ..., )

ctags.name: message
ctags.pattern: /^    message: str = Field(..., description="Health status message")$/
